content.detailedDescription: On march 13th/2011 around 7:55pm i was driving my boys to their mother's home when we saw them. i turned left(west) onto stage line rd from old hwy 35 in hudson, wisconsin when i noticed two orange bright objects low in the sky straight in front of me and a little south. never seen anything there before, often see blackhawks and other helicoptors running with interstate 94 but these were more south of those flights and above residential homes. first i thought they were helicoptors flying to the west, the closer we got i realized that they were staying in one place! looked orange or fire color/amber and had no navigational lights, at this time i couldn't take my eyes off of them. i told my oldest son to look at them and tell me what he was seeing. he told me they weren't travelling but were moving closer and away from each other as i also agreed. it was a clear night with excellent visability. my son also descrbed them as flickering like a flame from a candle. i almost came to a stop because they were so stange i couldnt believe my eyes what are we seeing? i wanted to get a closer look, so i turned left into heritage greens a housing development then took the first right(west) the street then took a 90 degree turned and went south so i parked  at the turn facing west. the lights were pretty close an at about 11o'clock in front of us and about helicopter crusing hgt. i actually had to sit up in my seat and look up about 60-70 degrees. i rolled down the windows and we could not hear a sound from them. the whole time i was talking w my boys about what we were seeing; not planes, not helicoptors, not stars or planets. i was trying to figure out what to do, i got out of my truck to try to take a picture with my phone but there was a street right in front of me so i coudn't see them on the screen just alot of light.I got back in the truck my heart was racing and i felt shackey(a little scared) very erie feeling my youngest boy said he was scared and my oldest was too. i wanted to knock on a door at one of the houses but thought they may find me crazy or something, still watching them i thought that many people had to see them. i called my girlfriend and told her what was going on and even asked her to look but she was a couple miles east and more south she looked but didnt see them(she actually was looking in the wrong direction to the sw and saw planes going to the twin cities int. airport since their approach is just south of us and see them all the time) its been 4-5 minutes of watching this from the start, i was still on the phone with her when i decided to try to get closer. i was facing west, then turned my truck into the driveway of the house kiddy corner across the street imediatley backed out of the driveway looked up and they were gone!! no where in sight and we could see alot of sky. told my son he could not believe it as well he even said he tried to look where they were to see if they turned of their lights, but nothing. i was upset and my heart was still racing, couldn't believe that i didn't get to see them leave! it was almost like they knew we were watching them, saw me turn around and took off! weird!!!!!
content.summary: Noticed 2 objects/orange in color, in the sky around helicoptor cruising height

content.detailedDescription:
It was either early winter or late winter (no snow on the ground) in late 1965-early 1966. i was 10. the weather was very overcast, sometime mid to late afternoon. one of those days that was just really dark all day, but not at or near sundown. 
i had just entered my bedroom when i had a strong feeling to look out my window to the south. i saw four glowing saucers lined up at an angle seeming to glide to a stop and then took off in a split second in an "s" curve to the east. they were bright as car headlights look like on a rainy day, and the s shape burned into my vision for several minutes. i could see that the center of the classic saucer shapes was glowing with a slight golden tint, could see the contours of the rest of the shape on either side of the lighted part. it all took place in 1-2 seconds. they were located a little under a mile directly south of my house, probably over alverno college, near morgan avenue in milwaukee wi.
after i came to my senses (no missing time that i remember) i went downstairs to tell my dad "i think i just saw a ufo." he looked at me a little frightened, either because he'd seen something too, or maybe he thought i was crazy. i was into ufos and paranormal phenomena from a very young age, loved science fiction and ghost stories, and i realized as i told him about what i saw that he thought i was seeing things.  his response was "you're just imagining things." but he had this weird look on his face.
i have made several reports in the last few years, yet this is my first sighting; maybe i finally was able to condense the information to write it in a few paragraphs. this sighting was pretty damn close, i was wondering if anyone else saw this? 
am trying to recreate the incident using photoshop. will send when completed.
content.summary: Saw 4 saucers glide slowly and then take off in a flash.

content.detailedDescription: My youngest child and i were on the patio of our apartments and all of a sudden in the field adjacent to us, i were mesmerized by some beautiful, spinning, multicolored orbs. these were not fireworks. one way to describe this would be watching some sort of energy, spinning and building up speed in a circular motion, horizontal to the ground, lifting and then lowering after becoming larger as they spun, and smaller around as it lowered again disappearing into the ground. this is so hard to describe, wish i could somehow make a moving diagram for all to see, it was beautiful..Almost like a hologram, very colorful orbs. i always look to see if it will happen again, but nothing yet.
content.summary: Spinning multi colored orbs

content.detailedDescription: Sept.1st 4:30a.M. my dogs started barking,not wanting them to wake up my friend i put them out. as soon as i got them out, i witnessed a huge glowing oval craft hovering 20ft. over the trees across the street from the end of my driveway about200ft. from where i was standing.Freaking out, i yanked the dogs back in the house, grabbed a gun, woke my friend up from a sound sleep& dragged her outside in her stocking feet. we both stood there & witnessed a craft so huge we could not see either end of it. it was glowing very bright white with faint swirling thin lines of red,yellow, orange,blue&green,like flowing electricity.It was just hovering silently 20ft. directly over the tree line. i was mortified-scared out of my witts.I was thinking who's flying that thing? all my instincts were screaming get away from it-we were standing 200ft. from this thing that was bigger than a city block. we ran back in the house after only a couple minutes & i called 911! i told the officer what we saw & he gave me a mufon #. i called the mufon # & made a report. the mufon guy told me that he had been getting the same reports from indian river-45 miles from us for the last 10 days.He asked if it was still out there, my friend looked out the window & confirmed it was. i talked to the mufon guy for about 10 minutes, he asked me to write out a report & send it in which i never did until now.I always regreted not watching it longer or seeing it fly away, but i've never been so scared in my life. i think about it every day since,seeing a ufo so close & so big has changed my life forever.
content.summary: Huge, glowing white w/ faint swirling electrical lines-red yellow.Orange green blue -silent

content.detailedDescription: This is one of hundreds of these that i have video taped during the last several months around kasota, minnesota
content.summary: This is one of hundreds of these that i have video taped during the last several months around kasota, minnesota

content.detailedDescription: I am based in monaco, monte carlo. the date is 21/3/11 at 10.30 this morning (about 15 minutes ago) i went outside the office for a smoke. it is a perfectly clear sunny day. in the sky, very high up. i spotted some bright white/silverish...Orbs?? i suppose. at first i only seen one, but as i adjusted my eyes i saw there were more following. about 7 or 8 in total. all moving in the one direction and weaving in and out amongst each other. they were moving about the same speed as a plane but i could hear no sound. they looked very similar to the ones in new york that i had seen recently in a video....Has there been any explanation of that yet? this sort of sighting seems to be very common of late. any explanations?
content.summary: Multiple ufo's sighted over monaco

content.detailedDescription:
I was home waiting for my hubby to call on break @ 20:30 on sunday march 20, 2011. when he did call, he told me to go out and look at the sky to the west of my location. when i did, i didn't see anything at first. i went in te house and grabbed the night vision device that we have. (couldn't find the camera) and went back out to the west side of the house. with eye view seen the 3 pulsating lights in the sky about 30 degrees off the horizon to the west. i watched it for 2 min's to see if they were moving, which they were not. i putt the night scope to the lights and seen 3 pulsates before they disappeared. at which point i pulled night scope down and confirmed they were no longer there...

later at around 21:45 me and my mom seen the pulsating light in the sky just to the west again. they were not moving and disappeared at 21:52. sadly no film caught.
content.summary: 3 pulsating lights in a circler shape

content.detailedDescription:
Event 1

november 27 420pm approx.  saw a small white circle in the sky and stay constant then gradually dim out and disappear then slowly brighten up again and stay lit for 4-5 seconds then dim out again.  continued for 10-15 minutes as i drove down the 15s just about an hour out of vegas before you hit the mountains.  

event 1

jan 1 2001.  small white light in the sky.  saw the light while i was in los angeles and as i drove to irvine the same light was still there the whole way as i drove.  photo snapped in irvine of the same light i saw all the way from vegas.  looks exactly like the one i saw in vegas.  time was about 4-5am with other people to witness.  no alcohol btw.

i also have multiple photos of these but these are the clearest.  i took it will my cell phone cam.  images have been altered slightly by photoshop but just brightness only.
content.summary: Small circular light

content.detailedDescription: I was at work went on brake, i was talking to my wife on the phone when i got in to my car and looked up and to my east and saw 4 lights in a diamond pattern in the sky. 4 flashing red lights. they was just hoovering there, i told my wife to look turds my work and tell me if she sees any thing. as i was running to the door to get my co workers to see this. my boss came out and saw them just as they we moving in to a strait line. he said they was choppers. i pointed out to there was only a red light, no other colors.He called the other workers out. i was telling my wife what i was seeing. they started moving north east at a very slow pace. there was no sound, and there was no other air craft in the area, as they moved north they seemed to spread apart from each other, one heading more east then north.Then the lite farthest from me just vanished.The other 3 kept moving north east, it took about 3 min before my wife said she could see them from brighton, which is 16.4 miles north east of my work.She had my night vision scope looking at them.As she told me she could see them they flashed 2 times and vanished like the first one did.They seemed to move north and east and stop at times then move north east again.
content.summary: Flashing red lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside on the front porch of my home looking northeast in the skys. i noticed 3 red lights at first in the north sky moving in a line and equally apart in distance but moving very slowly towards the northeast sky.  my first impression was they were helicopters hovering over the area but i could not understand why all 3 lights were red only.
as they reached directly northeast of my sight they stopped moving. they probably sat in this position for about 5 minutes then two of them slowly and i mean very slowly continued on northeast but they did not stay in a straight line to each other. one was in a slightly higher position then the other.  the third red light stayed where all three had stopped earlier but slowly moved a little higher in the sky at that position and just stayed there.  eventually after 15 minutes of watching them one of the two red lights that continued further northeast the lower red light just disappeared.  the other two the one still directly in front of me and the other higher red light of the two that went further northeast continued to shine.  but shortly after the first red light disappeared about 2 or 3 minutes later the two remaining red lights at the same time disappeared.  i did not hear any noise from them this could be they were to far out in distance from me to be able to.  they did not appear to be helicopters as i had thought initially. where i live i see helicopters daily flying around my home but at night they have white lights on when approaching a small metro airport just south of my home where they have a helicopter training school.  i can not explain by the way the moved and did not move what exactly they could have been other than possibly some kind of military exercise of some short using only red lights on their craft which i do not think is legal to do in an area of the sky that is used heavily as a flight path for landing at denver international airport.  there were no commercial aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting.  there were two other witness with me.  the only issue with them as witnesses is that they had been drinking all day.  i first saw the lights and then ran back into the home to get them to come out to see what i was seeing.  one stayed with me until we both saw all the lights disappear.  i do not drink i was clearly aware of what i was seeing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three red lights hovering in the northeast skys of the front range north of broomfield colorado

content.detailedDescription: I lived across the river from my job. where i worked as a late shift rep. for a cable company. i left my house to go to my job by walking across the 6th street bridge. as i walked across i looked at the water as it ran over the dam. about half-way across i got a feeling that i needed to look up. when i did i ducked thinking something was falling from the sky. then noticed that what i thought was falling was slowly moving stright across. it was a large flat black disc. that made no sound. had no lights that i could see. it had no seems or rivet marks. it looked like looking at the bottom of a large bowl. i was in like shock just staring at it. i thought to my self i can't be seeing what i'm seeing. and noone is going to belive me. so i looked around to see if there was anyone else walking or driving by that could see this too. but there was noone around just the sound of the water was all i could hear. i stood there just watched as it followed the river down stream. it got down the river a good distance when it took off in a flash at an angle and disappeared. i got to work and told two of the guys that i worked with that i just saw a big ufo and they just laughed. the only reason i know the date so well is because it was the day before my birthday.
content.summary: Large low to the ground slow moving disc.

content.detailedDescription:
Three red dots in the sky, first they looked very uniform in a triangle, moving slowly to the east (?) (i'm in broomfield). then two of them veered off together, almost came to touch each other, then veered away and looked as if they were heading back toward the other red dot. they were very far away and appeared to flicker in the night sky. i'm not sure if they're still outside within view as i wanted to come in and report it! cars were stopped on our street (miramonte blvd in broomfield) watching what was a pretty eerie movement of three red lights in the sky.

i first noticed this driving home from the grocery store - then called my fiance and he saw them from our house. we couldn't video it with our phones or take photos because of lighting issues.

at first i thought maybe the lights were military planes in formation, but there was no noise and they were moving too slow way up in the sky to be planes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three red dots in sky, moving in sync, first in triangle, then a line

content.detailedDescription:
I was working second shift at the time, coming home around 1 - 2am. it seemed when traveling south on the anthony wayne trail, right before hitting waterville, i would see the same light above the tree line on my left. it was a white light, about 60-80 feet in the air. i never thought about it again, until it was the third night in a row i had seen it. this night was slightly different, however. the light slowly went from the east side of the trail to the west side, into the suburb of waterville. 

i took the way i normally went home, turning onto canal rd., then left onto wilkshire. as soon as i turned onto wilkshire, the light was hovering (estimate) about 60 feet off the ground, right above me. i pulled over, and got out of my car. i was staring at the light, trying to grasp what it was. it was dead silent outside, i initially thought it was a helicopter, but to my suprise, silence. this is a small community, and there is little to no traffic after 11pm. i would say i was there about 2-3 whole minutes, with the light not moving at all. then, the light started moving southbound on wilkshire. i followed it through waterville, and starting going out to the country. it started moving faster and faster away, but i was able to track it. i was going about 80mph, until i hit a stopsign. the light shot across the road again, and went into, what i thought was the field about 100 yards away. it lit up the whole area and you could see it come close to the ground, lighting up the ground, and then nothing. it completely disappeared. no sounds, nothing, just gone. i sat at the stopsign for about a minute, and went home. the next night, the light was not there anymore on my drive home, and i had never seen it again. 

upon telling this story, i do vaguely remember seeing this same light in the past coming home from church one night. i was young, and the parishoner who was taking me home, commented on it as well. the light was swinging back and fourth the country road ahead of us, and just vanished. the site of this incident was not far from the same field that the light disappeared from in the most recent sighting. strange, i know.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo chase after several nights of seeing the same object

content.detailedDescription:
This is the second night in a row i have seen the same thing, last night i saw 2 bright orange spheres in the sky from my kitchen window.  one was pure bright the other flashing, very rapid (never seen anything like that before). tonight i saw one single orange (very bright) sphere high in the sky it was very fast, no more than 5 minutes later a helicopter flew over my house heading in the same direction. my guess is that someone reported it or they knew it was in the air space but it was freaky.... two nights in a row. 
anyway if anyone else has any more reports from scotland or the paisley area i would love to hear them. 
with respect james.
content.summary: Paisley

content.detailedDescription: For the past six months i have been going to said address to watch and care for my g-ma. at night before i go to bed, i usually go outside, walk the property, smoke a cig then go to bed. well that night it was really clear out. so i took a few extra minutes to check out the stars and stuff. it was a gorgeous night that night. about halfway done with my cig, i looked southward because a bright light caught my attention. it looked like a clear xmas bulb. it came from the south, cleared the treeline behind my house. in my field of view( lookin south)  it appeared in the south then kinda started to go from my right to my left. as it was doing so it dimmed then brightened 2 or 3 times very slowly. it was absolutely silent! if i went to grab a camera i would have missed it! i was fixated anyway. when it was about to float 100 ft in front of me and slightly to my left, i yelled hey!!! 3 times and opened my arms up. when i did that, it circled me slowly one time then shot off so fast i couldnt believe it!!! i will admit that i already subscribe to the ancient astronaut theory and i do believe that life must exist elsewhere. this "light" was so silent and dimmed and brightened 3 times very slowly it was about 50 feet of the ground. now i am a definite believer that we are being visited.
content.summary: Bright clear xmas bulb silently clears the treeline and circles me once then shot off

content.detailedDescription: I am a photographer, and on march 19th i was outside taking pictures of the moon during its lunar perigee. my grandparents were also outside with me, playing with my daughter on her swing set. while aiming my shot of the moon i noticed what i thought was some debris on my lens, so i cleaned it and prepared to try the shot again. i observed at this point that i could make out the object only through the camera lens, and that it was not obvious to the naked eye. at that point i realized that i was not seeing a spec on my lens but rather something in the sky. i tried to use my auto focus to capture the object, but it kept focusing on the moon. i turned off the auto focus and manually targeted the object: this is the picture that is attached to this report. i don���t know if it is important, but my camera is a canon rebel t2i with a sigma 18-250 mm lens; the photograph was taken zoomed all the way in.  once the image was captured, i reviewed it on my camera and called my grandparents over to see what i had photographed. none of us had ever seen an airplane like this before. my grandparents and i both looked up but none of us could see the object. i set my camera to ���live mode��� (allowing us to see the viewfinder���s image on the screen on the back of the camera), positioned it, and we all saw the object. i���m not sure if we couldn���t see the object with the naked eye because of its size in the sky or something else, but whatever the case we could only see it through the camera. while i never actually saw the object moving, it was in slightly different positions to the moon every time i looked at it. we talked about it for a couple of minutes and i tried to get another picture of the object (i couldn���t find it this time) and we decided to come upload the images to the computer to look at them a little closer.
content.summary: Unknown craft observed while photographing the lunar perigee

content.detailedDescription: Was out feeding chickens saw a glimps out the corner of my eye told everyone inside and they came out to see them also
content.summary: Many v-shaped luminous very fast moving east to west followed by a slower moving wave of light  then by a shadowy wave

content.detailedDescription: ﻿these things are surfing through your skies. they are soooooo prevalent, i could video 100 of them in a few hours. if it is clear, they are flying low. if it is cloudy, they fly high. they used to be discs, now they have done a change up. your government cares so much about you, they don't want to scare you with the truth. isn't that considerate of them? the truth is coming, and not from the government. keep watching. just because you don't believe, doesn't mean it isn't happenin...I will keep more coming at *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) on youtube.
content.summary: Red orb

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on rt 30 in oswego/montgomery, i'm the western sky i see a fireball falling at a 45 degree angle heading south. 

my iphone was on my lap so i caught this photo of the object... 

*(link moved to additinal evidence section--cms/sg).

what was strange is that the flame went out and the object appeared to pull up from 45 degrees to about 30 degrees (give or take). 

moments later two jets flew by, and circled back. 

this picture/incident has attracted a lot of attention and i've received lots of feedback... others who saw similar things, people that think fermi lab is connected because of the shutting down of the particle accelerator, one person who thinks he might know here it landed due to military personal and police shutting down roads to search approx 30 miles west of where i witnessed the object, etc... 

just google *(wit's name removed--cms/sg) ufo to see just how much attention this received...
content.summary: Flaming ball that went out and pulled up

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were on the front part of our property taking night pictures of the super-close moon.  we did not see the object with our eyes.  it wasn't until we came in and put the pictures on the computer to process that we saw the light moving across the sky.  we ruled out plane/jet as we should have seen that with our naked eyes.  there was no sound, but it was far away and very high.  as you can see from the progression of the light it doesn't appear in the first photo, then starting with the 2nd it comes up from the tree line and goes up and to the right until it goes off the photo edge in the last picture.  when it was enlarged we could see the different lights.  they appear to be moving around the object in a rotating pattern. since we did not see the object until we processed the photos we had no reaction while it was going across the sky. but once we enlarged the object we could tell that it was not a plane or weather balloon.  the lights make it a totally unknown object to us.  perhaps you can help us out on what it could be?
i am attaching 3 of 6 3000 high resolution photos showing the object in progression from beginning to end.
content.summary: While taking pictures of the full moon we captured a lighted object going across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 9:50 pm on 2/4/11, it was a cloudy night and i was driving to olney, md to go to work. at the intersection from fieldcrest road to route 108 i noticed what at first i thought was just a spot light hitting the cloud cover above. the light was going in a circular motion that looked much like when you see a spot light at a construction site being projected in the air. i thought nothing of it, stopped at the traffic light and i turned right on 108 to head towards olney md. after driving for a minute i noticed the light was in front of me again and i could see it moving in the same circular motion, covering a lot of ground as it made each complete circle and at the same time moving forward with each circle it completed, heading in the same direction towards olney. 
i put down my windows and heard no sound from above, the clouds seemed to be kinda low so my only guess is maybe a helicopter could have been above it shinning a spot light down and moving it in a circular motion while it was traveling the same direction i was traveling. however i do not feel this is the case since looking at the oval shapped light it seemed as if it was glowing and having some sort of mass rather then being just a point of light being projected from above. i really do not know what i saw however its characteristics such as the way it moved acrossed the sky was significantly different from a plane or a helicopter. why would an air craft make spiral like motions to move from point a to b? the object finally went out of my sights as it headed towards sandy spring, md. at that time i had turned into work. it was certainly an odd thing to see.
content.summary: I saw a light above the clouds moving in a circular motion across a span of 6 miles

content.detailedDescription: The night started off with a dinner on my deck outside my home in acworth, ga.The night was winding down when a couple of friends kept pointing out a strange light in a north west area in the sky.At first i didn't look thinking they were confused on what they were looking at.After a few minutes they got me to look at the object.I noticed that it was pulsating and not stationary.The object moved slowly different directions.I found the object to be interesting so i went to get my 350mm telescope to see if i can get a closer look.I was able to get the object in scope and saw an amazing sphere pulsating as if it was ball of electricity.3 witnesses  viewed the object via telescope and all had the same opinion on we saw .The object was moving  making us change placement of the telescope multiple times.After roughly 20 mins the object accelerated north towards tennessee and disappeared behind the tree line.
content.summary: Pulsating  sphere white/lightblue/light magenta in color

content.detailedDescription:
I was 13/14 years old, my friend and i were behind my house when we saw a bright orange ball moving very slowly almost hovering, moving at less that 10 miles an hour and around 100 metres away from us. it was no more than 45 feet from the ground, we estimate the distance and height from the height and location of the buildings and trees in the immediate area of the object. the bright orange ball was approximately 4 or 5 feet in diameter and was seemingly moving just above some trees which were in the area, it dipped below the tree line where we knew there was a patch of spare ground and rose again above the trees as it exited the spare ground, it was now about the same height as the surrounding houses which were buildings consisting of ground floor and 1st floor only so judging by the height of the flight path looked as though it was happy to be just above the buildings and trees as if it were observing the area at close hand. because it was moving so slowly we were able to watch it for around two minutes, certainly no longer than that. it began to move towards us and we panicked and ran some 30 metres to my house where we went inside and looked out of my bedroom window but we could not see the object. we went back outside but the object was gone. that was 43 years ago.
i very rarely see my friend now except at weddings and funerals and very recently i was at a funeral and my friend was there. we started talking about our childhood along with other friends recalling memories and i said to my friend, "tell me if you can remeber this incident..." and without letting me complete the sentence i was about to say, he said, "i know what you're going to say, you're going to ask if i remember the day we saw the bright orange ball hovering in the sky aren't you"? so that prompted both of us to relate the story to the rest of the group. personally i was pleased he had remembered the sighting. around the same time (1967) i was also with a group of friends and we were lying on a patch of grass staring up at the sky on a very clear night. it was probably around september/october and it was in the evening, it was dark and not cloudy. we were looking for shooting stars. one of my friends pointed up at what looked like a star (small white light) moving across the sky and almost simultaneously another friend pointed out that there was another very similar object moving in from the other direction. they were travelling towards each other. in the space of about 2 or 3 minutes we watched both of these objects get nearer each other and to our amazement they collided and we witnessed what looked like a small explosion in space. given the height of these objects it could have been a huge explosion but we were on earth (obviously) and these things were up the stars. i've often wondered if these were earth based objects like satellites that had collided or something similar or if it was indeed extraterrestrial objects colliding, maybe there's a record of objects which were launched from earth crashing in space, i don't know if there is but i don't recall anything ever in the media related to objects in space colliding, that originated from earth. i hope you've found this interesting and for your information i'm a 58 year old senior lecturer in a college in glasgow and not some nutcase wasting your time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange ball moving very slowly at low altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving school with my girlfriend and we were walkng to my car.  as we were approaching my car, we noticed what appeared to be an indigo blue light, that was very bright along with a teal light that i believed at the time to be a human aircraft, in the distance. it was far enough that it could be sen without major movement of our eyes or head. i started my car, and i felt more and more compelled to look at it. my girlfriend felt somewhat disturbed by it. i watched the set of lights twirl about the sky, both constantly but erratically change brightness levels. the indigo object then did something i had never seen before. it proceeded in a direction, got very bright, then completely disappeared, the reappeared a good ways behind its starting point, moving in the same direction. after this, i dismissed the indigo blue light as being conventional, and convinced my girlfriend that we should get closer to it. we drove deeper into the city following the lights which had stayed close together. the teal light then began to come into shape. it appeared to be far but somewhat large. it also had a set of light underneath it that came on and off randomly but were in the form of a triangle or delta. the craft would roll and flip occasionally completely disappearing and reappearing and the indigo blue dot would accelerate and decelerate covering distances at speeds i've only seen fighters cover. but the acceleration and deceleration were considerably sharper. during the drive the delta shape disappeared completely and did not return. eventually i got up to right underneath the indigo blue object. it appeared to be somewhat large, much large than a fighter aircraft, but moved more than effortlessly. it was somewhat boomerang shaped. it seemed to be flat on the backside while having rounded front edges. it made absolutely no noise, and i observed it for the better part of about 3 to 5 minutes up close. it would float around, become difficult to see and then become bright again. the sky was clear so clouds were not an issue. it did however consistently pull a maneuver that closely resembled a pugachev's cobra. flying is a stalled position. because of previous commitments however i was required to abandon observation, however the craft was still moving about when i left. the light it created was very unique. at a distance it appeared indigo blue, however up close the light appeared similar to that of a black light but at the intensity greater than modern car headlights.

i was able to take a few pictures with my cellphone camera and recreate what i saw loosely in 3d. the shape of it is represented however the the piercing light is not.
content.summary: Two ufo's one boomerang, one trainagular flying irratically

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were leaving the mounds cemetery in marietta, ohio around 7:30pm on the evening of 9/2/2008.  while walking out i happened to look up and noticed this very long cigar/cylinder shaped metallic object moving fairly quickly through the sky. it moved silently and left no exhaust. completely silent! at first i thought it might be a commercial airliner however, it had no wings like a plane. i did not notice any windows. as it streaked across the sky we followed it on foot then by car and tried to get a good picture.  however, it was moving too fast and we lost it in the trees. it moved in a straight line across the sky and with no clouds and it being very sunny that day it was very noticeable with the sun beaming off of it. it was very shiny silver and metallic. i did happen to catch it two times with my camera and i will attach the pictures. they are unaltered- still original size. again this thing moved fairly quick, was very long and made absolutely no sound. left no exhaust as well.  my feelings were of intrigue. i could not imagine what this possibly could be.  maybe government/military??  i still don't know how it could fly at the same altitude or a little lower than a commercial plane but it made no sound, left no exhaust, and had no wings!!  we lost sight of it behind the trees. we rushed to the car and tried to track it down but couldn't catch up through town and lost it. it was heading in a southeast direction from marietta, ohio.
content.summary: Long cigar/cylinder metallic object noticed when sun reflected off of it above marietta ohio. totally silent, no exhaust

content.detailedDescription:
We were at our friend's house on the water in clearwater, fl (island way estates) facing the east taking pictures of the supermoon around 10:58 pm when i filmed these videos on my android phone using first the "posterize" filter (first two videos) and then back to the normal mode (last video). we saw these mysterious lights in the eastern sky just below the full moon. they were much brighter than appear on this video probably because the moon was so bright just above. it happened so fast i didn't think to switch back to normal mode at first, but when i realized it was in the "posterize" filter mode, i switched back to normal.

i think you can tell that we were somewhat surprized and excited by this event having had no prior experience with such unusual phenomenon.

it looked like flares floating in the air (attached to balloons or paratroopers?). there was no sound coming from them and they were drifting at about the same altitude moving from north to south just under the full moon if facing east. there was probably about 6 initially and then they turned off one by one or either drifted out of sight that way. we could not tell. about 20 minutes later i confirmed that the wind was blowing from north to south at i would say at about 8-10 knots.  

it looked as though they were over the waterway, so i am sure we were not the only people who saw them.  there were a lot of tourists at the beach this weekend and most knew about the super moon.
content.summary: we were at our friend's *(name deleted---cms/sg) in clearwater, fl facing the east taking pictures of the supermoon around 10:58 pm when was these lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside and i saw in the sky a small orange spot. it flickered as a flame as it moved from one point in the sky to the other. it then flickered out. there was no associated sound that i as able to hear and there was no visible contrail. the best guess i could manage would be that it was the tailfire of a rocket. it was very strange. i also had my co-workers come out of the office and observe the object, which they did.
content.summary: Orange round flame moved steadily across the sky at an even pace.

content.detailedDescription: On october 23, 2003 i attended the funai golf classic at disneyworld in orlando, florida and purchased a set of the new bushnell digital binoculars that had the capability of taking 72 1.2mp photos on its internal memory storage. and it had the capabilities of taking a series of shots for 1 second (9 frames) on the sports-action setting. these binoculars are a wysiwyg device that takes the photos with out the ability to change any settings (all-automatic). so i took all of the photos and when i returned to montana to my home i downloaded the 72 photos and cleared the memory. on the night of the 4th or 5th of november, 2003,i went out on my deck and i took a one second string of 9photos with the lens pointed up at approximately 45 degrees and due south. when i first saw the photos after downloading i thought i had left the lens caps on because it was just a black photo until i realized that the binos didn't have lens caps. when i opened up each photo then i saw the ufo. i had my brother take the photos to an eastern major university and his friend in the photo lab analyzed the photos and all of them show the same stars in them and the movement of the craft was most likely the beat of my heart which causes a slight movement effect that makes the craft look like it's jumping around. each photo is sequential and 1/10th of a second long with approximately 8-10 millisecond shutter interrogation time for the lens to clear. i contacted the tech support division at bushnell and they gave me the info on the shutter speed and the rest of the specs. i need to send you the other six photos which shows the craft with multi-colored propulsion streams and then it stops and changes shape and then in the 7th frame the craft travels all the way across the sky and goes through a red gas cloud. and then in the next frame the red gas cloud is gone but it still shows two red light which are gone in the last frame. which means it covered the entire distance from where it was located in the sky and then travelled through the gas cloud during the 8-10 millisecond shutter interrogation time. how do i send the rest of the photos? thanks and please let me know how to send the rest. *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: I went out on my deck with my digital binoculars and shot a 9 fr/1second long autoseries of a ufo flying,

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking amateur photos of the 19 march 2011 "super moon" at home in rural rapides parish, louisiana. when i reviewed my photos i noticed that one had two black circles (one larger than the other) against the moon.

i can't tell what the objects are but i do not believe that they are the result of a smudge on the camera lens since i took a photo seconds before this one and seconds after and they do not have these circles on them.
content.summary: Two black circles against the "super moon"

content.detailedDescription:
My children, *(names deleted--cms/sg) and i **(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) were going out to eat, driving in our minivan.  as we turned eastward onto oak tree lane i saw an arc of bright, well-defined orange light to the east, in the direction of the town of benton, ks.  at first i thought it might be a reflection so i pulled forward several yards but its aspect did not change.  i said to the kids, "hey, kids, what's that light."  the boys confirmed that they, too saw the light.  i pulled up again, just to be sure. 

sketching the object afterwards, the width of the bands of light were approximately one twelfth the length.  the color was a bright orange. the object was slightly less than the diameter of the full moon. 

as we sat at the crest of the small hill, we noticed that the light was not moving relative to the ground, but that it seemed to be rotating.  there appeared to be three ribbons of orange light.  in appearance, it was like someone had put a broad strip of neon lights, each covering about a hundred and twenty degrees of arc, around a disk, leaving uneven gaps of twenty to sixty degrees. the gaps conveyed the sense of rotation as they moved from south to north from our perspective.  the rotation rate was very slow, completing one arc-length every ten seconds or so, for a total of perhaps thirty seconds per apparent rotation.  the intensity of the light varied only as the edge of one arc disappeared and the next came into view.  i looked down at the clock to check the time.  the clock read 8:32.

the lights completed three apparent rotations, so we saw it for roughly a minute to a minute and a half.  after the final rotation the edge just rotated out of sight and was not replaced.  we lost sight of the lights.

i located the full moon which was behind low-lying clouds.  it was significantly south of the object we saw.  there is a small airport nearby.  we watched a small aircraft approach for a landing for comparison and the difference between it and what we had seen was stark.  there is an air force base, mcconnell, south of nearby wichita.  i have seen all manner of military aircraft, including f-117's and b-2's.  again, not in the least like this.

given the altitude of the clouds and the elevation off of the horizon of this object (roughly forty degrees), it could not have been very far away, at most perhaps a mile.  it was clearly beneath the clouds and lower than the later-approaching small aircraft, as no clouds obscured our view of the object while the aircraft was in and out of the clouds at a simlar point.  we were also sufficiently close to see the curvature of the object as the lights rotated around.  we could not, however, see any structure.

my initial thought was that i was seeing a reflection.  when i saw the rotation the experience seemed surreal.  our reaction was, "are we really seeing this?"  we talked about what we were seeing as we watched it.  afterwards i called my wife, who was working, and my best friend who was at home and described the event briefly to each, as did my children.
content.summary: 3 arcs of orange light, app. 120deg arcs. rotating while hovering
